titleStmt.title: Thompson & Nesmith to Ephraim L. Van Winkle
CWG1755

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
E. A. THOMPSON.
T. A. NESMITH.
Law and Collection Office
-- OF --
THOMPSON & NESMITH,
ATTORNEYS AT LAW,
NO. 25 WEST THIRD ST., CINCINNATI.
For the Collection of Claims and the transaction of Legal Business in all parts of the United States and Canadas.
Cincinnati, Jan 11 18564
Hon E. L. Vanwinkle
Secretary of State
Frankfort, Ky.
Dear Sir:

We desire to get Thos. W. Hulbert appointed a Commissioner of Kentucky for the State of Ohio. He is a young member of the Bar here, at present employed in my office, in every respect qualified for the office: and his appointment will be a convenience to the business men in this vicinity, there being at present no Kentucky Commissioner near to our office.
